notes: [Added] All settings can now be overridden via `config.php` in a multi-environment friendly way
[Added] Added multi-lingual support for both the Disqus embed and comments
[Improved] Separated the various tags out into Twig templates
[Improved] Cleaned up & refactored the templates & code
[Fixed] We now JSON-encode the data in the Disqus embed
[Fixed] Added data-cfasync=false to the script tags for CloudFlare RocketScript support
[Improved] We now JSON-encode the data in the Disqus embed
[Improved] Added data-cfasync=false to the script tags for CloudFlare RocketScript support
[Added] Added support for Craft 2.5 new plugin features
[Added] Added a controller to handle the custom logout URL
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where custom avatars no longer appeared
